definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Mr Green is always on his high horse.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生總是盛氣凌人的樣子。

sentences.english: His arrogant behaviours on court psyched his opponent out completely.
sentences.chinese: 他在法庭上那盛氣凌人的樣子把對方完全鎮懾住了。

sentences.english: The minister domineers over his inferiors.
sentences.chinese: 那位部長對下級盛氣凌人。

sentences.english: Why does David lord it over everybody? He's no better than the rest of us.
sentences.chinese: 戴維爲何盛氣凌晨人？他不比我們任何人強。

definition: deep roots and vigorous foliage (idiom)/(fig.) well established and growing strongly
fontanel (gap between the bones of an infant's skull)
treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
lit. to breathe out stale air and breathe in fresh (idiom, from Zhuangzi 庄子); fig. to get rid of the old and bring in the new
to use softness to conquer strength (idiom)
